website_summaries.verdict: While it will only work with those vehicles that use OAT coolant, this antifreeze has a high approval rating and better longevity than other blends.
pros: 10 year or 150,000 mile money-back guarantee should you have issues with the product
Ships as a 50/50 premix, so no mixing needed
cons: Only works with specific cars and trucks

customer_reviews.title: MS Number confusion
customer_reviews.text: Just feedback in case it helps anyone else... Needed to top off the coolant reservoir in my '17 Jeep Patriot... Manual called for Mopar OAT 10/150,000 MS.90032... Found this on Amazon but it was labeled MS.12106 ... Lots of warnings on line about mixing the wrong coolant and gumming up the system... Was concerned if this was the correct stuff... A little poking around on line found the Mopar Dealers Chemical Catalog... Turns out the MS.90032 is the concentrated product, the MS.12106 is the 50/50 premixed... Interchangeable with no problem... Bought it, poured it... no problem. No problem other than thinking that $25 is way too much for a jug of coolant... Oh well... Got the right OEM stuff...
customer_reviews.author: Quintin Cantu

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 purple coolant
customer_reviews.text: Don't trust your dealer to always know what they are doing. I bought my 2017 wrangler new from the dealer and noticed that they applied the pink 5 year/ 100,000 miles coolant which is for the 2012 and under jeeps. Now ill have to flush my whole system and apply the right purple 10 year/150,000 coolant.
customer_reviews.author: hector fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Coolant for 3.6l pentastar
customer_reviews.text: Original equipment mopar coolant for the 3.6 liter pentastar engine. These coolants are specifically formulated for engines requiring OAT coolant, do not use the universal or HOAT coolant in your pentastar engine or it will eat up your head gaskets.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Despite what Amazon says this is the correct fluid for the 2016 Ram EcoDiesel.
customer_reviews.text: Despite what Amazon says this is the correct fluid for the 2016 Ram EcoDiesel. Got some to have on hand since this stuff is not stocked in any of my local auto parts stores.
customer_reviews.author: W. M. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's anti-freeze. The thing is my car calls for an antifreeze that meets a specific Mopar spec that none of the regular brands are labeled as meeting. So I was glad Amazon had it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: OAT formula coolant
customer_reviews.text: This is the OAT formula for some 2013 and all 2014 and newer wranglers with the 3.6. I say some 13’s because there’s a gray area as to when Jeep switched from HOAT to OAT. They are NOT compatible. Coolant will gel over time if mixed and cause damage to the radiator and hoses. Cheaper than the dealer and I don’t have to put on pants to go get it. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Tommy L

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed for my 2016 ram 2500 cummins ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i needed for my 2016 ram 2500 cummins.Way cheeper then buying it at my dealer. On the 2013 and up ram cummins trucks make sure you use this (oat coolent).
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Better check what Anti Freeze they ship you
customer_reviews.text: I ordered part #68163849 AB, the anti freeze listed and pictured above for my 2019 Jeep Wrangler but was shipped the older antifreeze used in my 2008 Jeep Wrangler and totally incompatible with my current Jeep. The vendor refunded my money and said they didn't carry the new one and were updating the page. Make sure you check which antifreeze they ship you before you go pouring it into your vehicle. Was able to get the 68163849 AB at the dealer for a couple bucks less.
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: 2015 Dodge Grand Caravan...yes this is the coolant you need!
customer_reviews.text: As stated in the headline I needed coolant for a 2015 Dodge Grand Caravan. This is the coolant you need despite the difference in item numbers. The item number that is in the manual is the UNDILUTED version of this same thing. This is the 50/50 prediluted version of what you need and yes, it works lol. I had no issues with amazon, shipping and receiving this item. There were no leaks in the bottle itself either. Great product but it is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 15 jeep grand cherokee
customer_reviews.text: Great coolant for the price. This is the newer HOAT coolant that most fiat chrysler vehicles take. It is a red/purple color. I bought a jug for my 15 jeep grand cherokee just to keep the coolant topped off. This is prediluted so just add straight from the jug to the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Soullier

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This product is hard to come by and luckily it was on amazon. It is exactly what I was looking for, for my 2017.5 Jeep Compass. I noticed after this long winter my coolant was fairly low and didn't want to pay for the dealership to replace when I got an oil change. Everybody knows a dealership would charge too much.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

So far I can open the container but the nozzle is still dented down so it's difficult to open and close.
